SA15bsa0552u:4_0: yat sat tat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti /
SA15bsa0552u:5_0: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayituṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:5_3: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
SA15bsa0552u:5_7: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ padārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati;
SA15bsa0552u:5_11: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasidvasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa vāsidvasambhāvanāpi /
SA15bsa0552u:7_0: sambhave vā tenaiva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasidveralaṃ sattānumāneneti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:7_1: ucyate / anumānāntarameva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayātmakaṃ ghaṭe kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhakaṃ pramāṇāntaramasti,
SA15bsa0552u:7_2: tathā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇe tāvat ekāmarthakriyāṃ karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:7_3: atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi kiṃ tāme vārthakriyāṃ kuryādanyāṃ vā,
SA15bsa0552u:7_7: yadā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryyaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kāryye śakto 'śakto vā /
SA15bsa0552u:7_8: yadi śaktastadā varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt tatrāpi śaktatvāt śaktasya kṣepāyogāt /
SA15bsa0552u:7_11: athāśaktastadā ekatra kāryye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvvāraprasaraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:8_1: yadā hi śaktasya svabhāvasya vilambo 'pyasahyastadā dūrītsāritamakaraṇam /
SA15bsa0552u:8_4: tattadā tat kuryyāt / akurvvacca na jananavyavahārabhājanam /
SA15bsa0552u:8_5: tadevamekatra kāryye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedāt ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam /
SA15bsa0552u:9_0: atra prayogaḥ / yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayatyeva /
SA15bsa0552u:9_3_1: sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ sidvatvāt asidvistāvadasambhavinī /
SA15bsa0552u:9_6: sākṣādajanake 'pi kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet /
SA15bsa0552u:9_7: na / dvividho hi samarthavyavahāraḥ pāramārthikaḥ aupacārikaśca /
SA15bsa0552u:9_8: tatra yatpāramārthikam jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:9_9: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthita vījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvāt aupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte sambhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa0552u:10_0: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvvasya sarvvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:10_1: niyataścāyaṃ pratītaḥ / tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivarttamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisidveranavadyo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:10_2: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryyakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe ca atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyaṃ janayati /
SA15bsa0552u:11_0: atrāpi prayogaḥ / yadyadā yanna karoti / tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyaṃ yathā śālyaṅkuramakurvvan kodravaḥ śālyaṅkure /
SA15bsa0552u:11_1: na karoti caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyamiti vyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa0552u:12_2: na cānaikāntikatā pūrvvoktena nyāyena samartha vyavahāragocaratvajanakatvayovidhibhūtayoḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:13_0: yatpunaratroktaṃ yadyadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:13_1: kiṃ kāraṇatvaṃ? tatkāryyotpādānuguṇasahakārisākalyaṃ? āhosvit kāryyāvyabhicāraḥ? kāryyasambandho veti? tatra kāraṇatvameva karotyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:14_0: na cātrapakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryyāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:14_2: kāraṇatvasamarthavyavahāragocaratvayośca bṛkṣaśiṃśapayoriva vyāvṛttibhedo 'stītyanavasara eva evaṃvidhasya kṣudrapralāpasya /
SA15bsa0552u:14_3: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:14_6: dṛṣṭāntamātra eva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayābhyāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāt nanvābhyāmeva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirastviti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:14_7: astu ko doṣaḥ / yo hi pratipattā prativastu yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayatītyā dikamupanyasituṃ analasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:14_8_0: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa ttvekatradharmmiṇi yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ
SA15bsa0552u:14_9_1: samarthetarasvabhāvavirudvadharmmā dhyāsāt bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgatayā sapakṣatāmāvahati
SA15bsa0552u:15_0: na cāya manaikāntikaḥ / atraiva sādharmmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:15_1: nanu viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalābdyāptisiddhistasya copanyāsavārttāpi nāsti tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ prasādhiteti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:15_3_1: 'pi ghaṭasya śaktisambhave tadānīmevaitat karaṇamakaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā
SA15bsa0552u:15_3_2: pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:16_0: nanvevaṃ anvayamātramastu vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyamiti cet,
SA15bsa0552u:16_2: na dvividhā hi vyāptisiddhiranvayarūpā ca karttṛdharmmaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:16_4: vyatirekarūpā ca karmmadharmmaḥ sādhyābhāve sādhanasyāvaśyamabhāvo yaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:16_6: anyathā, ekasyāḥ eva siddhaḥ / tasmād / yathā viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe anvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi paścātparigalati /
SA15bsa0552u:16_8: tathā prasaṅgatadviparyyayahetudvayabalato niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi sandehaḥ paścātparigalatyeva /
SA15bsa0552u:16_11_0: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ tadevaṃ viparyyayabādhakapramāṇamantareṇāpi
SA15bsa0552u:17_0: nanu ca sādhanamidamasidvaṃ, na hi kāraṇabudhyā kāryyaṃ gṛhyate /
SA15bsa0552u:17_1: tasya bhāvitvāt / na ca kāryyabudhyā kāraṇam / tasyātītatvāt / na ca varttamānagrāhiṇā jñānena atītānāgatayorgrahaṇamatiprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa0552u:17_2: na ca pūrvvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātāsti kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa0552u:17_4: na ca pūrbbotarakālayoḥ sambittī tābhyāṃ vāsanā tayā ca hetuphalāvasāyī vikalpa iti yuktaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:17_5: sa hi vikalpo gṛhītānusandhāyako 'tadrūpasamāropako vā na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:17_7: vikalpavāsanāyā evābhāvāt / nāpi dvitīyaḥ; marīcikāyāmapi jalavijñānaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa0552u:18_1: tathā hi vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ vījādijñānāt kāryyādaṅkurādervā niścetavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:18_9: tadasaṅgatam, satyapi kāryyatvasattvayorvyāvṛttibhede sattvasidvau kutaḥ kāryyatvasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:18_11: bhavanañca sattā / sattā ca saugatānāṃ sāmarthyameva /
SA15bsa0552u:18_12: tataśca sāmarthyasandehe bhavatītyeva vaktumaśakyaṃ kathamabhūtvābhāvitvaṃ kāryyatvaṃ setsyati /
SA15bsa0552u:18_13: apekṣitaparavyāpāratvaṃ kāryyatvamityapi nāsato dharmmaḥ sattvañca sāmarthyaṃ tacca sandigdhamiti kutaḥ kāryyasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:18_14: tadasidvau pūrvvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsidvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:19_0: tathā virudvo 'pyayaṃ, tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvat ajātasyānanvayanirudvasya vā kāryyārambhakatvaṃ sambhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:19_1: na ca nispannasya tāvān kṣaṇo 'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryyāya vyāpāryyet /
SA15bsa0552u:19_4: tatsarvvamavastu, tataśca vastvātmake kṣaṇikatve sādhye 'vastūpasthāpayannanumānavikalpo virudvaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:19_5: yadvā, sarvvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye virudvatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti /
SA15bsa0552u:22_1: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tat pratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam /
SA15bsa0552u:22_3: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravartteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyate /
SA15bsa0552u:22_4: atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ / tadāsti tāvat sāmarthyapratītiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:22_5: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā virudvaṃ vaktumucitaṃ,
SA15bsa0552u:22_8: tathāhi kāraṇajñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva iti anvayaniścayo janyate,
SA15bsa0552u:22_9: tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbhaṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate /
SA15bsa0552u:27_3: kintu yatra pramāṇapratīte vījādau vastubhūte dharmmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthya tatra kṣaṇābhaṅga sādhanāya /
SA15bsa0552u:27_5: anyathā na kvacidapi vastumātrasyāpi pratipattiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:27_6: tasmācchāstrīyasattvalakṣaṇasandehe 'pi paṭupratyakṣavalāvalambitavastubhāve aṅkurādau kāryyatvamupalabhyamānaṃ vījādeḥ sāmarthyamupasthāpayatīti nāsidvidoṣāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:27_12: adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanāt vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasidviriti kva virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:28_0: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve api anyanivṛttī na vastunī svalakṣaṇāvagāhitve abhilāpasaṃsargānupapatteriti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:28_1: na / adhyavasāyasvarūpāparijñānāt agṛhīte 'pi vastuni mānasyādipravṛttikārakatvaṃ vikalpasyādhyavasāyitvaṃ,
SA15bsa0552u:28_7: pratiniyatasāmagrīprasūtāt, pratiniyatasvākārāt, pratiniyataśaktiyogāt, pratiniyata evātadrūpaparāvṛtte apratīte 'pi pravṛttisāmarthyadarśanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:28_8: yathā sarvvasyāsattve 'pi vījādaṅkurasyaivotpattiḥ dṛṣṭasya niyatahetuphalabhāvasya pratikṣeptumaśakyatvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:28_9: paraṃ vāhyenārthena sati pratibandhe prāmāṇyamanyathātvaprāmāṇyamiti viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:29_1: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto 'sambhavepyatadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt /
SA15bsa0552u:29_2: dvividho hi pratyakṣasya viṣayo grāhyo 'dhyavaseyaśca sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt /
SA15bsa0552u:29_14: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:29_16: yadvā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭātmako deśakālāntarabartī atadrūpaparāvṛttaḥ sarvvo viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:29_18: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, adṛṣṭatvāt / na ca tṛtīyaḥ, prastutaikaviśeṣadarśane 'pi deśakālāntaravarttināmadarśanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:30_4: anyathā ghaṭo 'pi ghaṭasantāno 'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyet sarvvātmanā grahaṇābhāvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:30_6: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu /
SA15bsa0552u:30_7: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatve sādhanasya virudvatvaṃ syāt iti na kaścidvirodhaprabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:31_2: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayavalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyettadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisidveranaikāntikatvaṃ na syāditi yuktam /
SA15bsa0552u:31_3: kevala midamevāsambhavi / tathāhi śakto 'pi ghaṭaḥ kramisahakāryyapekṣayā kramikāryyaṃ kariṣyati /
SA15bsa0552u:32_0: na caitad vaktavyaṃ samartho 'rthaḥ svarūpeṇa karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:32_1: svarūpañca sarvvadāstītyanupakāriṇi sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti,
SA15bsa0552u:32_4: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:32_5: tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt / tasmādarthaḥ samartho 'pi syāt na ca karotīti sandigdhavyatirekaḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:33_2: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe 'kṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ tādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurbbāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:33_3: na ca so 'pyakṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvādbhinna evābhidhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:33_7: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryyasambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:33_8: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ karttā syāt yuktametat /
SA15bsa0552u:33_9: kintu sāmagrī janikā tataḥ sahakāryyantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso 'pi na kāryyaprasava iti kimatra virudvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:33_10: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇakarotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:34_0_0: atrocyate / yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamepāmastu
SA15bsa0552u:34_0_1: ko niṣedvā? militaireva tu tatkāryya karttavyamiti kuto labhyate? pūrvvāparayorekasvabhāvatvādbhāvasya /
SA15bsa0552u:34_2: tasmāt sāmagrī janika naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:34_3: dṛśyate tāvadevamiti cet / dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭādbhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam /
SA15bsa0552u:34_4: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatti rna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryyotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti /
SA15bsa0552u:34_5: na ca pratyabhijñādibalādekatvasidviḥ tat pauruṣasya lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādāvapyupalambhato nirddalanāt,
SA15bsa0552u:34_9: vyāptau tu sākṣātparamparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake 'yogavyavacchedaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:34_12: tatsvabhāve ca vyāpye 'nyayogavyavacchedo vikalpāruḍharūpāpekṣayā vyāptau dvividhamavadhāraṃam /
SA15bsa0552u:34_13: nanu yadi pūrvvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvvadājanakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāttadāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ saṅgacchate /
SA15bsa0552u:34_14: na kṣaṇabhaṅgavādinā pūrvvāparakālayorekaḥ kaścidupalabdha iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:34_16: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvvakālabhāvī /
SA15bsa0552u:34_17: pūrvvakālabhāvī vā yo 'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī,
SA15bsa0552u:34_19: tathā ca sati sidvayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope sidvameva jananamajananambāsajyata iti /
SA15bsa0552u:35_1_0: na tu kāryyotpattihetuḥ / yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthya nijamāgantukañca sahakāryyantaraṃ
SA15bsa0552u:35_3: tathāpi yat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ arthakriyādharmmakamavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamugdīritaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:35_5: yattu kāryyeṇaiva sahakāriṇo 'pekṣanta ityupatkṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:35_6: yadi hi kāryyameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syādyuktametat /
SA15bsa0552u:35_9: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvvathāsamarthāḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:35_11: atha kāryyasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:37_2: na / yadi hi svayambhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryyaṃ tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāva iti pratītiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:37_3: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kāryyasvātantryānna bhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:37_4: tathā tadabhāve 'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryyeta /
SA15bsa0552u:39_0: tasmād yathaiva tadbhāve niyamena na bhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:39_6: yo hṛttarakāryyajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0552u:39_7: na tarhi tatkāryyakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikamapi karotīti /
SA15bsa0552u:40_0: atrocyate / sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasya uttarakālamevedaṃ kāryyaṃ na pūrvvakālamiti kuta etat /
SA15bsa0552u:40_2: kiṃ kurmmaḥ uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet;
SA15bsa0552u:40_4: sthiṣtvepyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:40_5: utedānīṃ pramāṇapratyāśā / dhūmādagnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:40_9: syāt svavacanavirodhaḥ / yadā tu kāraṇasya sthiratve kāryyasyottarakālatvamevāsaṅgatam /
SA15bsa0552u:40_12: uttarakāryyajananavyavahāragocaratvañca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryyakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmmiṇi sidvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:40_13: atastanmātrānubandhina uttarābhimatasya kāryyasya prathame kṣaṇe 'sambhavādeva prasaṅgaḥ kriyate /
SA15bsa0552u:40_14: na hi nīlakārake 'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasambhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodhonāma /
SA15bsa0552u:40_19: tathāhi bījamaṅkurādikaṃ kurvvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikantadākṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:40_20: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhāvau parasparavirudvau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta /
SA15bsa0552u:40_24: na ca bhidyate / tanna ! virudvadharmmādhyāso bhedakaḥ,
SA15bsa0552u:40_25: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ garddabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api virudvau dharmau /
SA15bsa0552u:40_27: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirvirudvadharmmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti /
SA15bsa0552u:41_1: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:41_2: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatradharmmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:41_3: tadatraikaḥ svbhāvaḥ svābhāvena virudvo yukto bhāvābhāvavat /
SA15bsa0552u:41_4: na tu svabhāvāntareṇa / ghaṭatvavastutvavat / evamaṅkurādikāritvaṃ tadakāritvena virudvaṃ na punarvastvantarakāritvena /
SA15bsa0552u:41_7: tadyadi pratiyogitvābhāvādanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāri ṇāvapi svabhāvāvavirudvo tatkārakatvānyākārakatve vā viṣayabhedādavirudve,
SA15bsa0552u:41_11: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryyaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādavirudve śaktayaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryye kālabhedādapyavirudve /
SA15bsa0552u:41_12: yathāpūrvvaṃ nniḥkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:42_0: ucyate / na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kāryye deśabhedādavirudve śaktyaśaktī brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:42_1: kintu virodhābhāvāt / taddeśakāryya kāritvaṃ hi taddeśakāryyākāritvena virudvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:42_8: ekasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanānnityatvasattvavadvā bhavediti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:42_9: tadatraikadharmmiṇi tat kālakāryyakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryyākāritvasyānyakāryyakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:42_10: tathā hi yatraiva dharmmiṇi tatkālakāryyakāritvamupalabdhanna tatraiva kālāntare tat kāryyākāritvamanyakāryyakāritvaṃ vā brahmaṇāpyupasaṃharttuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa0552u:42_11: yenānayoravirodhaḥ syāt / kṣaṇāntare kathita prasaṅgaviparyyayahetubhyāmavaśyambhāvena dharmmibhedaprasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:42_14: ata eva vajro 'pi pakṣakūkṣau nikṣiptaḥ kathamasau sphaṭiko varākaḥ kālabhedenābhedāsādhanāya dṛṣṭāntībhavitumarhati /
SA15bsa0552u:42_15: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryyāṇāṃ deśabhede 'pi dharmmibhedo yukto bhedasādhakapramāṇābhāvādindriyapratyakṣeṇa nirastavibhramāśaṅkenābhedaprasādhanācca /
SA15bsa0552u:42_16: iti na kālabhede 'pi śaktyaśaktyorvirodhaḥ svasamayamātrādapahastayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:43_5: tathāhyupasapaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro vījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvvasmādeva puñjāt samarthojāto 'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate /
SA15bsa0552u:43_6: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu vijasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva vījaṃ paramparayāṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati bījakṣaṇānnānye vījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥpātinaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:43_7: nahyupasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavarttināṃ vījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:43_8: athopasarpaṇāt prāṅna tat santāna varttino 'pi janayanti paramparayāpyaṅkurotpādānuguṇaṃ vījakṣaṇaṃ vījamātrajananātteṣāṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:43_10: hanta tarhi yadabhāve satyutpannopi na janayedeva /
SA15bsa0552u:43_11: tathā kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasambhavādādyātiśayotpādamaṅkuraṃ vā prati kṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmakenāpi svīkarttavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:43_13: nāpya pekṣā yujyate / samasamayakṣaṇayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayorivopakāryyopakārakabhāvāyogāditi nāsidvaḥ prathamo vyāpakābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:43_14: api cāntyo vījakṣaṇo 'napekṣo 'ṅkurādikaṃ kurvvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:44_0: nanu rūpāntareṇa karoti / tathā hi vījasyāṅkuraṃ pratyupādānatvaṃ kṣityādikaṃ tu prati sahakāritvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:44_5: abhede vā kathaṃ vījasya na nānātvaṃ bhinnatādātmyāt /
SA15bsa0552u:44_7: yadyucyeta / kśityādau janayitavye tadupādānam purvvameva kṣityādivījasya rūpāntaramiti /
SA15bsa0552u:44_11: na ca kṣaṇasyopakārasambhavo 'nyatra jananāt tasyābhedyatvādityanekatvamapi nāstīti dvitīyo 'pi vyāpakābhāvo na sidvaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:44_13: yadi manyetānupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo 'pekṣaṇīyāśca kāryyeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvāt sahakaraṇācca /
SA15bsa0552u:44_15: kariṣyate ca kramavat sahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryyāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasidveḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:45_0: atha pūrvvāvasthitasyaiva vījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha sambhūyakaraṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:45_4: karotyeva yadi syāt / svayamasambhavī tu kathaṃ karotu /
SA15bsa0552u:45_5: atha tadvā tādṛgvā āsīditi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:45_6: tatastādṛksvabhāvasambhavepyakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:45_8: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavarttiṣu vījakṣaṇeṣu sarvveṣveva sambhavī kintu keṣucideva karmmakarakara pallavasahacareṣu /
SA15bsa0552u:45_9: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilabanādipūrvvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvvāṇyeva vījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante,
SA15bsa0552u:46_0: ucyate / kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvvatra kāryye dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭañca sarvvāstikaprasidvametat /
SA15bsa0552u:46_2: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva vījakṣaṇānāṃ yena taeva vījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkurambā paramparayā janayeyu rnānye vījakṣaṇāḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:46_8: tadayamarthaḥ / pāṇisparśavataḥ kṣaṇasya na bhedabhinnānyakālakṣaṇādbhedo veti matadvaye mitibalaṃ yasyāstyasau jitvaraḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:46_10: sāmagrī tu na sarvvathekṣaṇasahā kāryyantu mānānugamamiti /
SA15bsa0552u:47_0: tadevaṃ nopakāro 'pekṣārtha ityanapekṣyaiva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu nobhayavyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:47_2: tadā yadi pūrvvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā /
SA15bsa0552u:47_7: yacca vījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede 'pi kāryyabhede 'pi kāryyasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ tadasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:47_10: prasaṅgasyānupadatvāt / yacca kāraṇābhede kāryyābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretaṃ sāmagrīsajātīyatve na kāryyavijātīyatetyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:47_11: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryyaṃ na karttavyaṃ nāma /
SA15bsa0552u:47_14: na cendriyapratyakṣaṃ bhinnadeśaṃ sapratighaṃ dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdhaṃ yena tatrāpi bhedaśaṅkā syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:47_16: nāpi sandigdhavyatirekaḥ / kṣityāderdrabyāntarasya vījasvabhāvatvenāsmābhirasvīkṛtatvāt anupakāriṇyapekṣāyāḥ pratyākhyānāt /
SA15bsa0552u:47_18: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasidvau na kṣaṇikāt sattvannivarttata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:47_19: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:47_22: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyyayayoḥ sattve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvamataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviriti sthitam /
